trans-unit.source: Manipulates a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"></xref> that has been applied by a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard"></xref> action.
trans-unit.target: Manipula um <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"> </xref> que foi aplicada por um <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard"> </xref> ação.

trans-unit.source: ## Pause, Resume, Stop, or Otherwise Control a Storyboard Interactively To be able to pause, resume, or otherwise control a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A> interactively, set the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> property of its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> and use a ControllableStoryboardAction object (such as <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ResumeStoryboard>, or <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.StopStoryboard>) to control it by referencing its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>.
trans-unit.target: ##Pausar, retomar, parar ou caso contrário, o controle um Storyboard interativamente a poderá pausar, retomar ou controlar um <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A>interativamente, defina o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>propriedade de seu <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard>e usar um objeto ControllableStoryboardAction (como <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ResumeStoryboard>, ou <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.StopStoryboard>) para controlar o referenciando seu <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.StopStoryboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ResumeStoryboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> of <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> is unspecified, the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A> cannot be interactively controlled after it is begun.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>de <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard>não for especificado, o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A>não pode ser controlado interativamente depois que ele é iniciado.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>

trans-unit.source: See [How to: Use Event Triggers to Control a Storyboard After It Starts](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) for more information.
trans-unit.target: Consulte [como: usar gatilhos de eventos para controlar um Storyboard após iniciar](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) para obter mais informações.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name*> of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard"></xref> that began the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"></xref> you want to interactively control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name*>do <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard"> </xref> que começou a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"> </xref> você deseja controlar interativamente.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name*> of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard"></xref> that began the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"></xref> you want to interactively control.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name*>do <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard"> </xref> que começou a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"> </xref> você deseja controlar interativamente.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name*>

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O valor padrão é <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.
